author: tv
msg: Added event creation on request. Fixes JCS-33

author: dhruba
msg: HADOOP-2652. Fix permission issues for HftpFileSystem. This is an
incompatible change since distcp may not be able to copy files
from cluster A (compiled with this patch) to cluster B (compiled
with previous versions). (Tsz Wo (Nicholas), SZE via dhruba)

author: pcl
msg: OPENJPA-437. Trivial change to be consistent with class usage between constructor and symbolic constant.
